title: Options Analysis for Reengineering (OAR): Issues and Conceptual Approach
Business Process Reengineering A review of recent literature
Using existing modeling techniques for manufacturing process reengineering: a case study
Downsizing, reengineering and patient safety: Numbers, newness and resultant risk
items.abstract: <jats:title>Abstract</jats:title><jats:p>Downsizing and reengineering are facts of life in contemporary healthcare organizations. In most instances, these organizational changes are undertaken in an attempt to increase productivity or cut operational costs with results measured in these terms. Less often considered are potential detrimental effects on patient safety or strategies, which might be used to minimize these risks.</jats:p>
